ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Tranix Crown Disappointment.....
ygData.msgSnippet: In my guild, this item was designated enchanters and bards first. I chose to wait until our enchanters got them before I took one for myself, but there s no
ygData.messageBody:
In my guild, this item was designated enchanters and bards first.
I chose to wait until our enchanters got them before I took one for myself,
but there's no reason a bard shouldn't be considered for the roll.


Elwyn

-----Original Message-----
From: John_Senior@... [mailto:John_Senior@...]
Sent: Thursday, April 13, 2000 11:05 AM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: [eqbards] Tranix Crown Disappointment.....


Last night on Veeshan a few members from 3-4 guilds participated in a Fire
Giant run, there were about 7 from our guild and 18 people in total so we
had more than enough, things went well and the first giants were killed
easily, our monk puller was doing an excellent job and managed to pull
Tranix solo, the crown was dropped and I asked to be in the roll for it,
there was only myself and an enchanter there that would use it to it's full
potential. But instead it was decided that the enchanter should get to keep
the item and that I shouldn't get to roll for it.

I was really angry to be treated like this especially as we have just got a
new charm song, the tranix crown would of been great.

I just thought I would post this here and see whether you guys and girls
think I should of got to roll for this item?

Madagan Songweaver, Bard of 44.8 Songs <Guardians of Light>
Veeshan Server
